interestingcomments.content: Help! Dust spots show when I take a video, but not when I take a picture. /!/ I have a Canon Rebel T6i and I am trying to take a video, but when it focuses on the clouds, dust spots show on the screen. It doesn’t how up when I take pictures though. I tried cleaning it but they are still showing up. Am I just not cleaning the dust properly?
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: Help! Dust spots show when I take a video, but not when I take a picture. /!/ I have a Canon Rebel T6i and I am trying to take a video, but when it focuses on the clouds, dust spots show on the screen. interestingcomments.content:
Got dust onto my viewfinder prism /!/ I noticed some dots (sharp and unsharp ones) while looking through my viewfinder on my 700D. First I thought it was the sensor but it looked clean. 
So I thought it must be the mirror and viewfinder. I tried cleaning it with the handblower, but since that didn't do anything I used a q-tip since I saw someone using it in a video guide. 
But that made everything worse and now the viewfinder looks like my glasses after 1 week without cleaning, everything's dusty and dirty and the spots from the beginning are still there!


What should I do?
